text: Name: frances frances E-Mail: frances.frances@gmail.com Address: Zhanjiang, China Github: https://github.com/frances LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/frances Phone No. 774736466429 	Summary	 Over 6+ years of extensive experience in web-based applications using LAMP, WAMP, PHP, Drupal, e-commerce & SEO technologies.
